FrozenRule.ArchRule: Types that are "ArchUnitNETTests.Fluent.FreezeTests+Violation" or "ArchUnitNETTests.Fluent.FreezeTests+Violation2" should be public
Slices matching "TestAssembly.Slices.(*).." should not depend on each other
Types that are "ArchUnitNETTests.Fluent.FreezeTests+Violation" or "ArchUnitNETTests.Fluent.FreezeTests+Violation2" should not be private
Types that are "ArchUnitNETTests.Fluent.FreezeTests+Violation" should be protected
Slices matching "TestAssembly.Slices.(**)" should not depend on each other
